doc.title: 4 Short Films by Rob Wheeler
doc.plot: A collection of student shorts by J. Robinson Wheeler, created at Stanford University and the University of Southern California (USC). Includes: "Chucky" (16mm), "Process Video" (Hi-8), "Life" (Hi-8), and "507x" (Super8).

A collection of student shorts by J. Robinson Wheeler, created at Stanford University and the University of Southern California (USC). Includes: "Chucky" (16mm), "Process Video" (Hi-8), "Life" (Hi-8), and "507x" (Super8).
